content.text:
# List of international presidential trips made by Alexander Lukashenko

Alexander Lukashenko, the first and only President of Belarus, has made several international visits since he assumed office on 20 July 1994.

! Areas visited
! Dates
! Details

|3 August 1994
|Working visit. Met with President Boris Yeltsin and Prime Minister Viktor Chernomyrdin.

|Moscow
|7-8 December 1999
|Met with President Boris Yeltsin and Prime Minister Vladimir Putin. Signed the Treaty on the Creation of a Union State of Russia and Belarus.

2000s
{| class="wikitable sortable"
! Country
! Areas visited
! Dates
! Details
|-
|
|Tripoli
|30 October – 1 November 2000
|Official visit. Met with Brotherly Leader and Guide of the Revolution Muammar Gaddafi and Minister of Defense Abu-Bakr Yunis Jabr.
|-
|
|Saint Petersburg
|30 May 2003
|Attended celebrations of the 300th anniversary of Saint Petersburg. Met with President Vladimir Putin.
|-
|
|Damascus
|9-10 December 2003
|Official visit. Met with President Bashar al-Assad.
|-
|
|Kiev
|27-28 October 2004
|Attended Liberation Day celebrations. Laid a wreath at the Tomb of the Unknown Soldier.
|-
|
|Beirut
|2-4 February 2005
|State visit. Met with President Émile Lahoud and Prime Minister Omar Karami.
|-
|
|Moscow
|24-25 April 2007
|Working visit. Attended the state funeral of Boris Yeltsin.
|-
|
|Caracas
|6-9 December 2007
|State visit.
|-
|
|Rome
|27-28 April 2009
|Working visit. Met with Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi.
|-
|

|27 April 2009
|Working visit. Met with Pope Benedict XVI.
|-
|
|Vilnius
|16 September 2009
|Working visit. Met with President Dalia Grybauskaitė.
|-
|
|Kiev
|5-6 November 2009
|Working visit. Met with President Viktor Yushchenko.
|}

|Working visit. Met with President Abdullah Gül and Prime Minister Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

|-

|7-8 March 2013
|Attended the state funeral of Hugo Chávez.
|-

|18 July 2013

|3 March 2015
|Working visit. Attended a meeting of the Supreme State Council of the Union State.
|-
|
|New York City
|26-29 September 2015
|Working visit. Visited the National September 11 Memorial & Museum. Attended the UN Summit on Sustainable Development. Addressed the general debate of the seventieth session of the United Nations General Assembly.
|-
|
|Rome
|20-21 May 2016
|Working visit. Met with President Sergio Mattarella.
|-
|
|Vatican City
|21 May 2016
|Working visit. Met with Pope Francis.
|-
|
|Cairo
|15-16 January 2017
|Working visit. Met with President Abdel Fattah el-Sisi.
|-
|
|Kiev
|20-21 July 2017
|Official visit. Met with President Petro Poroshenko. Visited the National Museum of the Holodomor-Genocide.
|-
|
|New Delhi
|11-12 September 2017
|State visit. Met with President Ram Nath Kovind and Prime Minister Narendra Modi.
|-
|
|Chișinău
|April 2018
|
|-

|Dushanbe
|May 14-18, 2018
|Official visit.

|Working visit. Met with President Volodymyr Zelenskyy. Attended the Second Forum of the Regions of Ukraine and the Republic of Belarus.
|-
|
|Vienna
|12-13 November 2019
|Official visit. Met with President Alexander Van der Bellen and Chancellor Sebastian Kurz.
|-
|
|Moscow
|20 December 2019
|Working visit. Attended the CIS summit.
